beans:
<jpa:repositories base-package="<%= basePackage %>.data, <%= corePackage %>.data" factory-class="<%= corePackage %>.data.CustomJpaRepositoryFactoryBean"/>
<property name="persistenceUnitName" value="<%= extras.name %>" /> <property name="packagesToScan" value="<%= basePackage %>.domain, <%= corePackage %>.domain" />
<%= _.unescape('${hibernate.dialect}') %> <%= _.unescape('${hibernate.default_schema}') %> <%= _.unescape('${hibernate.show_sql}') %> <%= _.unescape('${hibernate.hbm2ddl.auto}') %>
<%= corePackage %>.data.CustomNamingStrategy true org.hibernate.cache.ehcache.EhCacheRegionFactory America/Los_Angeles
<property name="driverClassName" value="<%= _.unescape('${jdbc.driver}') %>" /> <property name="url" value="<%= _.unescape('${jdbc.url}') %>" /> <property name="username" value="<%= _.unescape('${jdbc.user}') %>" /> <property name="password" value="<%= _.unescape('${jdbc.password}') %>" />
<jee:jndi-lookup id="dataSource" jndi-name="jdbc/<%= extras.name %>" />
